text: FIFA 23 is a 2022 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Vancouver and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Series S, Nintendo Switch, Google Stadia and Microsoft Windows. Kylian Mbappé is the cover athlete for the standard and legacy editions. Mbappé shares the cover of the final edition with Sam Kerr. title: FIFA 23
